name: Mini Perforated Leather Backpack
description:
In another Iteration of the beloved Collegiate Backpack, the robust and handsome lines and style has been reinterpreted in a soft supple perforated leather. The shape takes inspiration from the classic sportswear backpack only with every detail re-imagined in for our collections. The Backpack features double Industrial zipper closure, and an exterior double layer zip pocket.

The Product is handmade in the USA

15" x 11" x 3" - With a 25" Zipper closure

Purchase to Preorder, the Backpack will ship August 28

name: Python Leather Collegiate Backpack
description:
Draped in luxurious Python leather, and trimmed in Black calfskin, the Python leather Collegiate Backpack is for the most daring of collectors. Doubled lined in black leather, features an interior zip pocket as well as an outside double walled zippered pocket. 

The product is Made in USA with Italian Sourced Skins

The Python Backpack cannot be shipped to California

Due to the Handmade nature of the product, please allow for a 7- 12 day period before a shipment notification is sent.

name: Perforated Leather Collegiate Backpack
description:
In another Iteration of the beloved Collegiate Backpack, the robust and handsome lines and style has been reinterpreted in a soft supple perforated leather. The shape takes inspiration from the classic sportswear backpack only with every detail re-imagined in for our collections. The Backpack features double Industrial zipper closure,  and an exterior double layer zip pocket.

The Product is handmade in the USA

17" x 13" x 3" - With a 28" Zipper closure

Purchase to Preorder, the Backpack will ship August 28

name: Black Lambskin Collegiate Backpack
description:
With leathers sourced from Italian lambskin, and industrial sized silver hardware, the Lambskin Leather collegiate backpack is the perfect mix of utility and modern luxury. The shape takes inspiration from the classic sportswear backpack only with every detail re-imagined in for our collections. The Backpack features Double Industrial Zipper Closure, an interior Patch Pocket as well as exterior Double Zip Pocket. 

The Product is handmade in the USA

Due to the nature of our handcrafted leather good products please allow for 1-2 Weeks for notice of post mark and delivery.

17" x 13" x 3" - With a 28" Zipper closure

name: Lavender Suede Mini Collegiate Backpack
description:
In an exclusive Collaboration with Olivia Wolfe and Stephanie Krasnoff of American Two Shot, the standard collegiate backpack has taken a change of colors as well as size adjustment. The smaller frame allows the more utilitarian backpack shape to conform to a more transitional accessory that takes the wearer from the office to the dance-floor seamlessly. The Mini Collegiate Backpack measures: 15" x 11" x 3" - With a 25" Zipper closure Will comfortably fit a 13" Macbook Pro / Air Available Exclusively at the American Two Shot store:
View Larger Map

name: Suede Collegiate Backpack
description:
The Refined yet simply stylized backpack is re imagined in a Tan Neutral Toned suede leather. A rather lightweight alternative to the Full leather pieces, the Suede Collegiate backpack will be offered in a variety of colors easy to wear and addictive to carry.

Seen on Nick and Joe Jonas during 2013 Coachella Music Festival

name: BLACK Leather and Canvas Utility Backpack
description:
Black Cotton Canvas, Double Faced for Added Strength, yet incredibly Light. Trimmed with Thin Black Buffalo Leather gives the bag a discreet and nondescript look and feel. Double Zipper Closure as well as interior Patch Pocket as well as exterior Double Zip Pocket for maximal portability. 

Handmade in the USA

Due to the nature of our handcrafted leather good products please allow for 4-5 Days for notice of post mark and delivery.

name: Pebbled Lambskin Leather Backpack
description:
Produced Entirely of Pebbled Shrunken Lambskin Leather, and Exclusively Lined in luxuriosuly soft suede.  The Lambskin backpack is the perfect mix of utility and modern luxury. The shape takes inspiration from the classic sportswear backpack only with every detail re-imagined in for our collections. The Backpack features Double Industrial Zipper Closure,  an interior Patch Pocket as well as exterior Double Zip Pocket. 

Made in the USA 

Due to the nature of our handcrafted leather good products please allow for 4-5 Days for notice of post mark and delivery.

name: Black Tumbled Cowhide Backpack
description:
A Reinterpretation of a school yard classic, re-imagined into soft supple textured cowhide leather. The Black Tumbled Cowhide Backpack an absolute necessity for the everyday as well as traveling the world. The Distinctive hardware and refined details gives the backpack a luxurious update as well as giving it the ability to appropriate to almost any wardrobe and any social setting. 

The Product is handmade in the USA

Due to the nature of our handcrafted leather good products please allow for 1-2 Weeks for notice of post mark and delivery.

17" x 13" x 3" - With a 28" Zipper closure

name: Swiss Dopp Kitt SM
description:
A Massively functional piece, for harboring your pens and pencils in class or the endless degrees of Bobbi Brown & Cosmetic products you have swimming in your bags. The Dopp Kit is made of waxed cowhide which accentuates the beauty of the leather sporting a timeless aged look and feel. 

The Top Zipper Measures 7"

The Dopp Kitt Measures: 7" x 3" x 3.5"

Made in The USA

name: The Expedition
description:
A re-appropriated classic, that is fit for a weeks worth of essentials, the Expedition bag is created to globe trot anywhere and sports the look of a time tested travel companion. The Expedition is created in a true aged, antiqued cowhide leather that has an amazing lightness for portability as well as the strength to withstand the test of time and long term use. The Large Shiny silver top zip expands past the ends of the bag, allowing for maximal storage space and features two side pockets for easy access as well as an interior zip pocket for small essentials. The Shoulder straps can be adjusted to a desired length as well as taken off completely. 

22 x 11 x 11

At the Moment the Expedition is Made to Order, Please Allow for a 2 - 4 Week Grace Period Prior to your order to be personally processed, produced and sent a shipment notification. 

The Antiqued Cowhide is Sourced from Italy and Hand produced in the USA

name: Swiss Dopp Kit SL
description:
A Massively functional piece, for harboring your grooming supplies, toiletries and the endless degrees of Bobbi Brown & Cosmetic products you have swimming in your bags. The Dopp Kit is visioned in an antiqued cowhide leather, that with time will collect and carry markings from use to add to its rugged utilitarian look.

The Top Zipper Measures 11.5"

The Dopp Kit Measures: 10" x 4" x 5"

Made in The USA

name: Travertine Book Strap Folder
description:
An instantly recognizable timeline accessory, that is reminiscent of time spent in elementary school or at an Ivy League. The Travertine Folder is constructed as a hold all for your documents 8" x 11". and the Exterior allows for books and notepads to be kept separately yet within the same element. The Cross Straps allows for fluidity yet when safely secured with tension slides you won't have to worry about misplaced books. Travertine Folder Measures: 13.5" x 10" // Zip Opening : 12" Also Available at American Two Shot
View Larger Map

name: The Neo Travertine
description:
An updated version of the Much Loved Travertine Folder. The Neo Travertine is equipped with more room to hold documents as well as a 13" Apple Macbook. The connecting straps on the outside criss-cross to keep in place any smaller books or gadgets that need to stick together, and can be easily seen and accessed.  

The Interior is Lined in a Tonal Microfiber Suede.

The Neo Travertine Measures 14" Long x 11" Tall x 2" Wide

name: Scout Rucksack
description:
Destined for the Rugged life, the Scout Rucksack is designed to withstand long lasting ventures or to tote your goods around the city. Visioned in Soft suede and trimmed in the unmistakable Burl leather, the hard and soft qualities is meant to bring a sense of balance to the users quality of wear. Doubled tension straps that will secure your goods in place, with a hidden zip compartment for your quick stash-a-ways and an interior patch pocket, utility reign supreme. 

The Rucksack measures :

18" Tall x 16" Wide x 4.5" Base

Shown with a Apple Macbook Pro 15"

The Product is handmade in USA

Due to the nature of our handcrafted goods please allow for 4-5 Days for notice of post mark and delivery.

name: Macbook Case Docu-folder
description:
A perfect companion for a 13" Macbook Pro Case, that doubles as a document holder. Furnished in either a Camel cowhide, or a heavily waxed and Oiled Brompton leather the Docu-folder. Features a rounded zip to ensure maximal use of the space, snugly fits a 13" macbook pro case as well a few documents and papers.

Measures 14" x 11" x 1.5" 

Made in USA

name: Black Antiqued Leather Travertine
description:
An instantly recognizable timeline accessory, that is reminiscent of time spent in elementary school or at an Ivy League. The Travertine Folder is constructed as a hold all for your documents 8" x 11". and the Exterior allows for books and notepads to be kept separately yet within the same element. The Cross Straps allows for fluidity yet when safely secured with tension slides you won't have to worry about misplaced books.

Travertine Folder Measures:

13.5" x 10" // Zip Opening : 12"

Comes with a detachable shoulder strap option

options.name: Travertine Folder with Removable Shoulder Strap

name: Reversible Scuba Bag
description:
A surprising take on a mundane accessory, the Plastic Bag has recently enjoyed some time fabricated in a range different materials, most popularly seen in White Muslin Cloth, recycled plastics, and most decadently in Leather. 

I'd Like to say I  was one of the first, to reimagine a product that usually has a connotation of something lost in the wind, something so covetable and a direct dichotomy of what it stands for.

http://www.bleachblack.com/?p=4337

Measures:

Made Exclusively in The United States, of Black Calfskin
Free Shipping

name: ShadowplayNYC x Khoi Le Space Pouches
description:
Shadowplaynyc X Khoi Le     

Printed fold over pouch featuring a real image of space taken by NASA's Hubble Telescope of the Cats Paw Nebula paired with black leather on opposite side. Features a detachable leather clip wristley. Designed in collaboration with accessories designers of Shadowplaynyc.

100% Leather, and 100% Linen/Cotton blend canvas.

Measures 14.5" by 13" unfolded.

 

Image courtesy NASA/JPL-Caltech, Hubble Hertitage Team

name: Personal Triangle Leather Tray
description:
A Must Have to complete any home decor project and keep a civilized and organized life. The Personal Square Leather Tray is meant to take all the personal everyday carry and harbor them in one compact space. The Trays are made of Bridle leather for Horse Saddles, or double sided Leather, and feature riveted corners.

The Trays Measures: 7" x 7" x 7" 

The Personal Leather Trays are made in USA

Please Allow for a 4-7 Day Grace Period Prior to your order to be personally processed, produced and sent a shipment notification.

name: Personal SQ' Leather Tray
description:
A Must Have to complete any home decor project and keep a civilized and organized life. The Personal Square Leather Tray is meant to take all the personal everyday carry and harbor them in one compact space. The Trays are made of Bridle leather for Horse Saddles, or double sided Leather. The Tray was featured in the Green Distressed Leather for New York Magazine's November Issue as a "best bet".

The Trays Measures: 7" x 7" x 1.25"  with capacity for 6" x 6" x 1.25"

The Personal SQ' Leather Trays are made in USA

Please Allow for a 4-7 Day Grace Period Prior to your order to be personally processed, produced and sent a shipment notification.

name: Amber Polygon Zip Pouch
description:
A clean and classic zip pouch meant for storing personal necessities and a flat travel documents. The zipper reaches around the edges to ensure that everything fits and utilizes the complete size of the pouch. This version is created in Amber Colored Antiqued Cowhide, that features a special sheen and ages with time. 

The Case Measures 11" Tall x 9" Wide

Made in USA

Please Allow for a 4-7 Day Grace Period Prior to your order to be personally processed, produced and sent a shipment notification.

name: Antiqued Leather Pentagon Wallet
description:
Constructed of a continuous piece of antiqued cowhide, with a full leather backing to keep structure and durability. The Pentagon Wallet is a luxurious challenge to combat the overstuffed wallet. With its simple zip top for cash, and the front patch pocket for cards the Pentagon Wallet is a sure way to simplify your everyday carry.

The Python Pentagon Wallet Measures: 5" x 3.5"

RiRi Zipper Fastens: 4" Perfect fold for cash
Front Pocket: 4.5" Perfect Tension to keep Cards in place

Made in USA

Please Allow for a 1 - 2 Week Grace Period Prior to your order to be personally processed, produced and sent a shipment notification.

name: The Porter Folder
description:
This Oversized Accessory is perfect for carrying a large amount of papers or as an Art portfolio. The Porter Folder features notched corners that acts as a base, and will stand upright, the edges are finished with a special acrylic paint to keep edges crisp and clean. The Leather used is an antiqued cowhide that already shows wear, and will continue to carry on gaining character through time and use.

The Porter Folder measures:

18" Wide x 12" Tall x 1.5" Base

This piece is a one of a Kind item.
Made in USA

name: Polygon Zip Portfolio
description:
The Larger Version of the Polygon Zip Pouch, the Zip Portfolio is meant to house all your important documents while within the work week or to take on the weekend. The Lengthy and generous size makes for a great fit for loose papers or notebook, pads or sketchbooks. The Zipper is lengthened through the corners to ensure that the whole folder is utilized.  Shown in Grey Bison

The Folder measures : 15" Wide x 11" Tall

Made in USA

Please Allow for a 1 - 2 Week Grace Period Prior to your order to be personally processed, produced and sent a shipment notification.

name: Polygon Ipad Zip Case
description:
A clean and classic zip pouch meant for storing personal necessities and a flat travel documents. The zipper reaches around the edges to ensure that everything fits and with the special Ipad Zip case sizing the Ipad slides in completely and completely fits. This version is created in Black antiqued cowhide and lined with black synthetic leather. 

The Case Measures 11" Tall x 9" Wide

Made in USA

Please Allow for a 4-7 Day Grace Period Prior to your order to be personally processed, produced and sent a shipment notification.

name: Juliette Seydoux - Self Titled Book of Illustrations
description:
Juliette Seydoux is an inter-disciplinary artist who explores both illustration and fine art as part of her practice. Born and raised in Paris, she saw her everyday life change when she arrived in New York City.
This book, featuring illustrations taken from her personal diary, daily sketches and quick drawings is a collection of images that best depict her daily life and her surroundings, her relationship with others and the relationship she has with herself. 

The Book of Illustrations are Printed in the USA and shipped out of New York City. For EU Orders, books will be shipped out of France.

name: Verseau Sports Duffle
description: Aptly shaped to house your classic essentials, a clean streamlined design with classic trimmings and interesting proportions makes the Verseau Sports Duffle an easy choice for your carryall needs. The Sports Duffle is constructed in a distressed tan cowhide with waxed leather trims and a large industrial zipper closure. The Sports Duffle is lined in natural cotton canvas and is handmade in the USA.

name: Black Antiqued Leather Dopp Kit SM
description:
A Massively functional piece, for harboring your pens and pencils in class or the endless degrees of Bobbi Brown & Cosmetic products you have swimming in your bags. The Dopp Kit is made of waxed cowhide which accentuates the beauty of the leather sporting a timeless aged look and feel.

The Top Zipper Measures 7"

The Dopp Kitt Measures: 7" x 3" x 3.5"

Made in The USA

description:
A Massively functional piece for harboring your grooming supplies, toiletries and the endless degrees of Bobbi Brown & Cosmetic products you have swimming in your bags. The Dopp Kit is visioned in an antiqued cowhide leather, that with time will collect and carry markings from use to add to its rugged utilitarian look.

The Top Zipper Measures 11.5"

The Dopp Kit Measures: 10" x 4" x 5"

Pictured with the accompanying piece " Dopp Kit SM"

Made in The USA

name: Triptych Weekender
description:
The Perfect Size for a weekend getaway, the Triptych weekender features rolled American Bison Handles and antiqued Cowhide Leather body and trims. The Interior features a medium sized zip pouch for storing small necessities and the removable shoulder straps allow for a  breezy hands free airport experience. 

The Weekender Measures:

14" x  23" x 3"

name: Waxed Leather Portico Bag
description:
The Portico Bag is one derived from a simplified Pattern matched with specialized construction techniques that gives it form. The Waxy Leather that is light, supple, yet hold a strong shape give the Portico a refined and sleek boxy silhouette. The Handles are Furnished from Both Bees Waxed Cowhide and Dark Brown Buffalo.  

The Portico Measures: 10" Tall x 14.5" Wide x 2" Notched Corners.

Made In the USA

name: Garten Canvas and Leather Tote
description: Named after our favorite East Hampton television personality, the Garten tote is a perfect companion for a quick stop at the local farmers market or a day at the beach. The Body is constructed of a natural cotton canvas with a leather paneled bottom and trims ensuring optimal durability. The Garten totes also features a hickory stripe lining and swivel snap clip on the side for partial closure.

name: Burl Wood Bison Courrier
description:
A Large Carry All, that can be meant for your everyday work routine or perhaps a quick getaway bag for the weekend trip. The Bison leather body is plush and decadent, and the heavily waxed dyed handles are firm but smooth to the touch. The fine detailing and sophisticated lines create a timeless piece fit for any wardrobe.

The Courrier Measures: 15"  across the top x 15" Deep x 13" Base

Made in The USA. Exclusively one of a Kind

name: Paragon Leather Zip Pouch
description:
A refined staple that leaves the tradition clutch behind, the Paragon Zip Pouch is crafted to be effortlessly simple and house an endless amount of necessities. Finnished with smooth Shiny Silver Zipper closure and lined in textile fabric, the Pouch is ideal for daily carry from daytime to the late night hours. 

The Paragon zip Pouch measures: 13" x 11"

name: Meta Pouch
description:
A True necessity for keeping your carryall organized, or for a quick hands free clutch. The Meta pouch is ideal for only the most basic amount of goods, such as your phone, wallet ,keys and any smaller personal items. Its clean construction and luxurious fabrications will it inseparable to the user. Fully lined in Linen-Cotton textile, polished metal zipper closure.

Image Shows Bark Lambskin

The Meta Pouch Measures

7" Tall x 9" Wide

Handmade in the USA

name: Burl Flat Pouch
description:
A Simple and discreet carrier of all things necessary. A Swiftly Size Zip pouch constructed in a firmly tanned leather that's reminiscent of that old beloved arm chair. 

Measures 9" x 5.5" 

Made in USA

name: Key Clasp
description:
A Simple yet refined everyday accessory, with an antiqued brass Swivel Snap clasp and key ring attached to a Tuscan red bridle leather tag featuring tonal stitching. 

Made in USA

name: Bourbon Rust Travel Tote
description:
Uniquely Sized and constructed in Heavy Duty Rust Colored Waxed Treated Nubuck, the Bourbon Tote is meant to carry anything from a weekends wardrobe to firewood from the forrest. Sewn from One Piece of Nubuck, the Bourbon Tote is trimmed with saddled colored wax finished cowhide, and complete with an interior flat pouch. Industrial Oxidized Brass Rivets complete the seams and fastens the handles.

Made in the USA. Exclusively one of a Kind

* Handles have been rolled and  hand sewn for Comfort*
